title: Enjoy FRA’s AirXperience Day: “Showtime – Welcome Las Vegas”Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Enjoy FRA’s AirXperience Day: “Showtime – Welcome Las Vegas” Published on : Saturday, October 10, 2015
Fraport AG’s upcoming AirXperience Day on October 11 presents “Showtime – Welcome Las Vegas”, an exciting program of events and activities for the entire family focusing on the glittering city of entertainment. From 10:00 to 18:00, Frankfurt Airport (FRA) will be transformed into the “AirXperience Casino” with first-class, world-class impersonators performing on the stage and taking visitors back to the golden age of entertainment – an unforgettable day awaits you at FRA.
The Las Vegas Show will bring the stars of the past back into the spotlight. Oliver Steinhoff, winner of the European Elvis Impersonator Championship, has his fans convinced that “Steinhoff is Elvis!”. Doris Dee is Germany’s leading Marilyn Monroe impersonator. Rarely has this film icon been more credibly copied. Her voice is a perfect match and she performs all of Monroe’s songs live. The Rat Pack is unforgettable as well. — writing musical history with their mega hits and unique stage shows. Today, they live on in the hearts of millions of fans worldwide at on October 11 at FRA! Randolph Rose as Sammy Davis Jr., Achim Bardohl as Frank Sinatra, and Jürgen Weber as Dean Martin will transport admiring fans back to the halcyon days of show music during the AirXperience Day this Sunday. Pamela O’Neal, as Tina Turner, will astonish and entertain visitors with a tribute to her idol. A special feast for the eyes will be the performance of the beautiful Vegas Showgirls, with their absolute synchronicity, breathtaking costumes and dazzling dance moves.
And what would Las Vegas be without the glitzy world of gambling? Black jack, roulette and dice will create a real casino feeling in the passenger terminals. Slideshows will dramatize the most spectacular parts of Nevada’s beautiful landscapes.
Our popular AirXperience raffle will also be dedicated to the theme of Las Vegas. All participants have a chance of winning one of many attractive prizes including a round trip to Las Vegas for two people with Condor — one of FRA’s home carriers.
There will also be plenty of fun for children at this event. Face-painting booths will provide the wildest make-up from roaring lions and glittering princesses to Spider-Man and Catwoman. Arts and crafts will be offered in the Airport City Mall on the lower level zero of Terminal 1.
Frankfurt Airport’s many shops and restaurants will also be open on AirXperience Day, offering ample opportunities for browsing, shopping and relaxing. A perfect way to round off your visit is to join in one of Fraport’s interesting Airport Tours, which can be booked in advance online, or to enjoy FRA’s Visitor’s Terrace which offers a different perspective on the busy flight schedule of Frankfurt Airport.
Everyone visiting AirXperience Day can park for four hours free in the P2 and P3 car parks at Terminal 1 and the P8 and P9 car parks at Terminal 2. All other parking areas, including business parking, parking at The Squaire, short-term parking spaces, etc. are excluded from this offer.
More AirXperience Days will be coming to FRA later this year: on November 7 and 8 with “Destination: Wine – International Wine Fair”, and December 13 with “Star Hunters – New Worlds, Distant Galaxies”.
Source:- Fraport
